page.title: 06CRANBOURNE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {Cranbourne School}is a small country school in Berkshire with 100 children .It has connections with schools in England and Canada. The school in England is Owlsmoor Primary School in Sandhurst. Each year the fourth years of Cranbourne and Owlsmoor meet together and go on a field trip to Swanage,Dorset. The school in Canada is the Bowen Island Community School .Some second and third years have been written to and have sent back letters and are now pen pals. We have three computers,two Vic 20's and one B.B.C Micro . We use these fairly regularly on Projects, Reading,and Number Skills. We have several packs of computer tapes . The school also has its own learner swimming pool which is used in the summer term .
